entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:35 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
